content: We are sorry to learn that you have not received your items.
The orders and items for our promotions are handled by various fulfillment houses we hire.
We contacted the fulfillment house handling this promotion for us, order was lost in the mail or misdirected.
If you have any documents relating to this order please mail it into us and we will check further into it.
We apologize for any inconvenience this causes you.
Should you again have any questions regarding our products or promotions, your cigarette pack. A representative will be glad to assist you.
Thank you for taking part in our offers. We wish we could be of your next purchase.
Best wishes from all of us at Reynolds.
body.title: Consumer Relations Representative
